title: Portfolio Website
description: This website is a portfolio of my work, designed to showcase my skills and projects. I used HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to create this website, and I used Git version control (Github) to manage the project. I also used React as a framework for the web application.

title: Pokemon Tabletop Reunited, Foundry Virtual TableTop System
description:
A Pokemon Tabletop Reunited system for Foundry Virtual Tabletop. This system is designed to be a complete overhaul of the original Pokemon Tabletop United system, with a focus on ease of use and automation. I worked with other developers to produce and expansion to the web-based application, Foundry Virtual Tabletop. I made use of Git version control (Github) to contribute JavaScript, HTML, and CSS changes to the community made project and my work on this project led to being named a key contributor.
We are now beginning to create a 2nd edition of this project using TypeScript.

title: Legacy Lau Gar Website Development
description: I provided technical support to the Kung Fu club I attend, writing a static HTML Website for the club to advertise to potential new members and provide session information to current members.
